
.. contents::
   :local:
   :depth: 1

==========================
SyncEvent
==========================

The sync protocol is used to syncronize different review tools to each other. It can also be used to record
the activities of a review tool, either for later playback or for parts of the playback (e.g. just for annotations)>


See:
   * https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dmo5Le5elqNNl9p4GpcRPT76BV7r6KYtrapHITD25uA/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.3jckyebptegj
   * https://lf-aswf.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/PRWG/pages/11274625/OTIO-Based+Synchronized+Review+Messaging#Annotation-Schemas

.. automodule:: schemadefs.SyncEvent
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   :no-index:
